analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika kenaci viññeyya duka

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci
analyzed: anidassana sappaṭigham kenaci viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na kenaci

original: viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana sappaṭigham kenaci viññeyyam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na kenacid viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana sa paṭigha

original: kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na kenacid viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: hetu paccayā pe anidassana sappaṭigham kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nakenaci viññeyyo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: na kenacid viññeyyaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na kenacid viññeyyaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na kenacid viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyañca anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyañca
analyzed: anidassana sappaṭigham kenaci viññeyyam ca anidassana appaṭigham kenaci viññeyyam ca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na kenacid viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: … cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe pannarasa …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
analyzed: cha saṅkhitta hetuyā aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇe tīṇi pe aññamaññe pannarasa pe avigate aṭṭhārasa

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanakenaci
analyzed: anidassana sappaṭigham kenaci viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na na kenaci

original: viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe tīṇi
analyzed: viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇe tīṇi
pe aññamaññe pannarasa pe avigate aṭṭhārasa
